Apex at Montage Deer Valley

Modern American Steakhouse $$$$ Deer Valley

Montage Deer Valley's signature restaurant that transforms into 'Apex Steak' each evening. Features unique Alpenglobes for 90-minute enclosed outdoor dining experiences with panoramic Deer Valley views. Executive Chef Kevin Hee brings progressive twists to traditional American steakhouse classics.

Must-Try Dishes

  • A5 Japanese Wagyu
  • Shellfish Platter
  • Beef Tartare w/ roasted bone marrow
  • Organic Salmon
  • Filet Mignon
  • Flambéed signature desserts

Features & Amenities

Alpenglobes Mountain Views Ski In Ski Out Complimentary Valet Fireplace Wine List Private Dining

Perfect For

Date Night Special Occasion Business Dining

Restaurant Information

Hours

Breakfast 7-10:30am, Lunch 11:30am-3pm, Dinner 5:30-9:30pm

Contact

9100 Marsac Ave, Park City, UT 84060

435-604-1402
